column4: How does this sound: 1st partition - Windows System, 2nd - Windows Program Files and data storage for Ubuntu and Widnows (NTFS), 3rd - Ubuntu, 4th - /Home, 5th - Swap.
What from ubuntu would go on NTFS?  What is data storage for ubuntu that isn't in / and /home ??
the NTFS partition would be to store all the data, such as audio, video, documents, etc.
